LanguageData.VRE_Sensitivity_Dangerous_Hediff.label: небезпечна ультрафіолеточутливість
LanguageData.VRE_Sensitivity_Dangerous_Hediff.descrip: This is a hidden hediff that modifies the pawn's Sight depending on sunlight.
LanguageData.VRE_ConsumedAnimalHemogen.label: спожито тваринний гемоген
LanguageData.VRE_ConsumedAnimalHemogen.description: Animal hemogen increases regeneration and combat capabilities of the user, but greatly decreases the capability to communicate with others.
LanguageData.VRE_ConsumedCorpseHemogen.label: спожито гемоген з трупа
LanguageData.VRE_ConsumedCorpseHemogen.description: Corpse hemogen greatly weakens the carrier of this hemogen type, but increases consciousness and blood filtration significantly.
LanguageData.VRE_ConsumedSanguophageHemogen.label: спожито гемоген сангофага
LanguageData.VRE_ConsumedSanguophageHemogen.descripti: Sanguophage hemogen gives the carrier a powerful boost to all capacities.
LanguageData.VRE_SharpTalons.label: гострі пазурі
LanguageData.VRE_SharpTalons.description: Гострі пазурі, які можна використовувати в ближньому бою.
LanguageData.VRE_DraincasketSickness.label: трупна хвороба
LanguageData.VRE_DraincasketSickness.description: After-effects of using a draincasket. Symptoms of draincasket sickness typically include localized pain, swelling, and redness at the site of the draincasket tubes' connection. Victims may experience increasing fatigue, weakness, and a general feeling of malaise.
LanguageData.VRE_DraincasketSickness.descriptionShort: After-effects of using a draincasket. Victims may experience increasing fatigue, weakness, and a general feeling of malaise.
LanguageData.VRE_SolidifiedHemogen.label: затверділий гемоген
LanguageData.VRE_SolidifiedHemogen.description: Armor is enhanced because this person used a hemogen solidifier while deathresting. This effect lasts until the next deathrest.
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenAmplifiedWeak.label: гемоген посилений, слабо
LanguageData.VRE_HemogenAmplifiedWeak.description: All hemogen gains are multiplied up because this person used a small hemogen amplifier while deathresting. This effect lasts until the next deathrest.
